channel.title: MSBuild on Coding Aloud
channel.description: Recent content in MSBuild on Coding Aloud

item.title: Creating NuGet packages
item.description: Lately I have been involved in the creation of several NuGet packages useful for some portals being developed. I want to share my knowledge in this topic. If we were developing libraries for .NET Core or .NET Standard life would be easy as figure 1 to figure 8 shows. Figure 1: “Creating a new .NET Core library”. Figure 2: “Default code”. Figure 3: “First build results”. Figure 4: “Project properties”.
